titleStmt.title: Riches of mercy to men in misery, or, Certain excellent treatises concerning the dignity and duty of Gods children by the late Reverend and Faithfull Minister of Jesus Christ, John Preston ...
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.T., and are to be sold by John Alen,

notesStmt.note: "A pattern of wholesome words" has special t.p. with imprint: London : Printed by J.T. for Francis Eglesfield, 1658.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
